welcome.title: Welcome to Hagicode Desktop
welcome.description: Hagicode Desktop is the local launcher for Hagicode, allowing you to quickly use Hagicode locally. We'll help you complete the first-time installation and configuration in about 3-5 minutes.

manage.title: Version Management
manage.description: Manage Hagicode Server installation and updates

monitor.title: Service Monitoring
monitor.description: Start, stop, and monitor service status

steps.download: Download the latest Hagicode Server package
steps.launch: Start the service and verify it's running

complete.title: Download Complete!
complete.message: Package file verified. You can now continue with dependency installation.

dependencies.title: Install System Dependencies
dependencies.subtitle: Hagicode requires certain system dependencies to function properly.
dependencies.description: Check the installation status of system dependencies

complete.title: Dependencies Installed
complete.message: All dependencies have been successfully installed.

error.message: Some dependencies failed to install. Please install them manually and continue.

depInstallConfirm.title: Install Missing Dependencies
depInstallConfirm.versionMismatchNote: Some dependencies have incorrect versions and need to be upgraded.
depInstallConfirm.mixedMissingMessage: Detected {{missing}} missing and {{mismatch}} version mismatched dependency
depInstallConfirm.mixedMissingMessage_other: Detected {{missing}} missing and {{mismatch}} version mismatched dependencies
depInstallConfirm.upgradeNote: Version mismatched dependencies will be upgraded to the required version.
depInstallConfirm.permissionWarning: Installing these dependencies may require administrator privileges.

complete.title: Setup Complete!
complete.subtitle: Hagicode Desktop has been successfully installed and started.
complete.success: Congratulations! Hagicode Desktop has been successfully installed and started.
complete.ready: You can now start using all features.

whatsNext.title: You can now:
whatsNext.manage: Manage Hagicode Server from the main interface

skip.title: Confirm Skip Setup
skip.description: Are you sure you want to skip the first-time setup?
skip.manualInstallNote:
After skipping, you can:
• Manually install Hagicode Server through "Package Management" in the main interface
• Re-enable the setup process in settings
skip.reenableNote: If this is your first time using Hagicode Desktop, we recommend completing the setup process.

dependencyCheck.title: Dependency Check Results
dependencyCheck.summary: Checked {{total}} {{total, plural, =1 {dependency} other {dependencies}}}, {{passed}} {{passed, plural, =1 {passed} other {passed}}}, {{failed}} {{failed, plural, =1 {needs attention} other {need attention}}}

llmInstallation.title: AI-Powered Installation
llmInstallation.description: Use Claude AI assistant to automatically install dependencies
llmInstallation.invalidKey: Invalid API key, please check and try again

installationConfirmation.title: Confirm Installation Status
installationConfirmation.checkDescription: Please check that the installation process in the terminal window has completed successfully without errors.
installationConfirmation.confirm: Confirm success, continue to next step

installationHelp.title: Installation Help
installationHelp.description: If you encountered issues during installation, please refer to the following troubleshooting steps.

network.title: Check Network Connection
network.description: Ensure your network connection is working and can access the Claude API service.

permissions.title: Check Permissions
permissions.description: Some installation operations may require administrator privileges.

cliPath.title: Check CLI Path
cliPath.description: Ensure Claude Code CLI is properly installed and added to your system PATH.

apiKey.title: Check API Key
apiKey.description: Verify your API key is valid and has sufficient quota.
